pr_title: Support dumping file based tokens when custom keys are not in use

timeline.message: Modified token decoding when custom keys are not used so file based tokens can be correctly dumped

timeline.bodyText: Thus customKeys == multikey. You could replace every use of customKeys by multikey.
timeline.author: ftence
